Package network

Interface Summary
Interface A network interface.
Kernel Logic responsible for handling routing and messaging for a single node.
Node A machine on the network.
OperatingSystem The API by which a Process can perform system operations such as OperatingSystem.send(Message) and OperatingSystem.receive(int).
Process The software loaded into a node.
Simulator The main control interface to the simulation.
Simulator.NodeBuilder A constructor object for Node objects.
UserKernel A kernel which can load and run a Process with user code.
 

Class Summary
AbstractKernel  
AbstractProcess  
Message<T extends Serializable>  
SimulatorFactory Entry point to the network simulator.
 

Enum Summary
KnownPort  
 

Exception Summary
Interface.DisconnectedException Exception indicating that an Interface.send(Message) call was made to an interface that has been disconnected.
NodeNotRunningException  
OperatingSystem.DisconnectedException Exception indicating that an OperatingSystem.send(Message) call was made when the node is not connected to any other.
